Good game, but very low AC system.

A magnificent FPS game that stood the test of time.

This game lives up to the hype created for it, by its undying fanbase, whose skill level has no ceiling. I would recommend playing with friends though, as it makes the experience more fun, and less toxic. 

The achievements in this game are a grind, made easier by the helpful workshop maps created by the community to lessen the hundreds of hours it would take to complete the game 'legitimately'. Some achievements require some additional work and downloads, as the achievements which are locked to specific maps are unachievable in the game's current state. This is as the maps which are required are not in the current map rotation, but they can be downloaded using guides.

Overall, this game is one worth experiencing, and I highly recommend it.
